title: File
description: Metadata for a single recording file.

date.title: Recording Date
date.description: Date when the recording was made (ISO format).

duration.title: Duration (seconds)
duration.description: Duration of the recording in seconds.

format.title: File Format
format.description: File format of the recording (e.g., WAV, AVI).

sampling_rate.title: Sampling Rate (Hz)
sampling_rate.description: Sampling rate of the recording in Hz (e.g., 300000).

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Optional notes about this specific file.

size.title: File Size (bytes)
size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

doi.title: DOI
doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the file, if applicable.

number.title: Vocalization Number
number.description: Number of vocalizations in the recording, if applicable.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: List of subjects (e.g., animals) involved in the recording.
